website_summaries.verdict: Tall, slender glasses give every drink a fun, modern look.
pros: Glasses are tall, sleek, and modern-looking
The mouth of the glass is an ideal size for drinking
Glasses have a solid, heavy base that feels made to last
cons: Glasses are a little on the thin side

customer_reviews.title: The glasses crack easily
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are very pretty BUT very fragile. In less than a month, 2 glasses cracked. Only 2 adults live in my house and they were treated rather gently. The manufacturers description did not mention the material being thinner and it definitely is.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and all in one piece. One glass has the smallest imperfection on the side, but nothing that would worry me. These glasses were just what I was looking for to mix cocktails, G&T's, Bloody Caesar etc. Looked in World Market and could find nothing that came close to these glasses, plus our local World Market Is only a Junk furniture outlet now. I think these glasses were really good value!.
customer_reviews.author: Gaffer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Neither the outer box or the interior box showed any damage, but when I picked it up, I could hear glass pieces moving in the box. When we opened it every glass was damaged. Some where broken into tiny pieces, what I would call smithereens. The rest had chips in the lip of the glasses. This was a huge disappointment. Amazon replaced the set and the second box came without any problem. The first box seemed as if someone decided to mail every broken glass they had because it made no sense. Glad the second box was fine, but made me feel I should go back to a store where I can see the merch physically before I purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Read R

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant
customer_reviews.text: I really like these glasses. They have a very solid feel to them, helped by the slightly weighted bottom and a very sleek, elegant look. Great for everyday use but pretty enough for a more formal occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Music Lover Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and can be used for various occasions
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these glasses, however, they are quite thin. I have only owned them for a short period of time but worry they may chip in the dishwasher if they clink against something. They can be used for various occasions, however, as they are very sleek looking!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: I'm Over the Moon . . .
customer_reviews.text: It may sound crazy but I am in love with this set of glasses. They are tall, sleek, and elegant. The way they feel in your hand is perfect: not too heavy, not too light--just right. I know I will be inconsolable the day I break one--which is inevitable. I'm buying a second set just to have replacements on hand.
customer_reviews.author: TimBoston

customer_reviews.title: Big hands & little hands give thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Recently used these glasses for a large hoiday gathering. Both adults and little tykes were able to hold these slender glasses to quench their thirst. So far they seem durable. Albeit it's a bit early, a year later I should update this review. However, 12 nice looking glasses for about $50 was quite a deal. It's difficult to find drinking glasses under 14 ounces that are actually drinking glasses. Confusing statement but true. Most are huge, 16 ounces or more. Slender profile, great drinkability, clean and clear glasses with thicker glass to "weight" the bottom. IMO these are 5 star for sure!
customer_reviews.author: squinja7000

customer_reviews.title: Simple chrystal clear glass makes for great presentation.
customer_reviews.text: The right glasses make a difference. Simple glasses make for good drink presentation. Unfortunately one of the 18 glasses ordered was broken. Since the only option was a return it wasn't worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Buster Thinks

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet stylish drinking glasses...
customer_reviews.text: I’m super happy with these simple but stylish glasses. The size is unique and easy to hold for smaller feminine hands. They do feel a bit more delicate but I’ve had no issue with breakage when using ice dispenser in fridge or washing them as I hand wash everything. Wouldn’t recommend using dishwasher unless a plastic cup was placed between each one. I will say I am surprised they were not broken after shipping as there was no bubble wrap, paper or anything in the box to protect them. I ordered 2 sets of glasses, different sizes and no cracks or chips upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and solid enough for dishwasher and chilling in freezer
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are great and are just as pictured. While they could be a bit thicker, they are sturdy enough for the dishwasher and chilling in the freezer. Can't really beat them for the price.
customer_reviews.author: petermane

customer_reviews.title: not high end but serviceable
customer_reviews.text: As a value these are great. If you want high end barware they are not thin glass; they don't have a thin lip and they are too small for large ice cubes. That said I'm tired of all the higher end highball glasses chipping or breaking. So if you need day to day barware, this is an excellent compromise.
customer_reviews.author: chaz

customer_reviews.title: Great style!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shape and style. The only thing I can complain about is the slight deformities in the glass. They are VERY minor deformities and you probably won’t notice them, but I have a keen eye for those details so I did.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Grommesh

customer_reviews.title: Breaks/Cracks easily
customer_reviews.text: I like these glasses but now have four instead of six. One broke the 2nd day from a slight knock against another glass. The other just now, came out of the dishwasher cracked. I'm very careful with all glassware. so know this shouldn't have happened.
customer_reviews.author: D. Muir

customer_reviews.title: NOt the best quality
customer_reviews.text: I had to return half of the glasses to get a decent set of 12. Many had air bubbles on them, some had small (1/16 to 1/8 inch) cracks. There is no sign of made where (like made in Italy or something like that). Glass came with this cloudy stain on them, when washed the glass is clear and fine but I am thinking it is probably to hide the defects when you look first and can't see the defects until you wash them.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Bulbul

customer_reviews.title: You cannot be sure that these glasses are made in Italy
customer_reviews.text: These glasses came in a brown, unmarked, box with printed text "Paksh Novelty Italian Highball Glasses [Set of 6] Clear Heavy Base Tall Bar Glass." There is no way of knowing that these are actually made in Italy, I can probably go and print a couple of boxes like this one in any printing store! Based on their quality, I am not sure they are. Returned for refund. If you don't care where they are made, they are OK. Two of mine had small chips on the rim - they did not look like they were broken, those were actual defects in the glass - sharp enough to give a cut!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple contemporary design - they have a really nice weight and feel
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't get glasses like these - I tend to go for quirkier sets. I got these mostly for gin and tonics and really like them. They are a great size for ice tea etc. Not too big and not too small for a decent drink. They definitely have heft. They don't look for feel overly fragile. I am glad I got them. For the price, they are a really solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DanNyc

customer_reviews.title: stunning ..  well made  and  beautifuly simple
customer_reviews.text: this glass was made for those delicious tall drinks .. a worthy glasses for sure .. well made , heavy bottom glass .. the perfect height for classic 1930s high balls Run and cokes a glass with the feel of polished quality crystal .. very impressed ... would recommend having a set or two for every bar ..
customer_reviews.author: peter hall

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these glasses - they are exactly the style and ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these glasses - they are exactly the style and size I was looking for and at a much better price than I had expected. Delivery was super fast and packed well to prevent any damage in transit. Very satisfied customer here!
customer_reviews.author: Auto Biographer

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy with good weight in the bottom
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the drinking glasses I was looking for. They are sturdy with good weight in the bottom. They seem durable. I'll buy these again but not on Amazon since I found the same drinking glasses somewhere else at a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great Collins glass and priced right 👍
customer_reviews.text: Great Collins glass. I've been developing my inner Bartender. The glasses feel good in the had but not bulky. I can't speak on how they hold up to the dishwasher because I hand was all my bar glasses. I don't trust my kids. Many things have been mysterious broken and no one knows how.😉
customer_reviews.author: EMSTOP

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but fragile.
customer_reviews.text: These are so pretty! I didn’t really read the box to see if it said dishwasher safe or not and I threw some of them in there the first time, and one of them broke. They’re very fragile but if you take good care of them they’ll work great for cocktails and things!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses to make a Tom Collins complete.
customer_reviews.text: I was really worried about buying glasses online but thankfully they arrived undamaged. These are perfect for any highball, collins, or fizz application. They seem sturdy. I hand wash only due to the horror stories I've read but so far so good. I love these glasses. They really complete the drink.
customer_reviews.author: Allie R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pernod/Ricard glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Have been shopping EVERYWHERE for these traditional Pernod/Ricard glasses in France & San Francisco with no luck for 2 years. Finally thought about Amazon. Yahoo, they are perfect for my husband’s anniversary gift with his favorite bottle of Ricard 🥂.
customer_reviews.author: Sherris Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, dont wash in dish washer
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of these glasses. The weird thing, even with glass cleaner I can't get soap streaks off.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Fort

customer_reviews.title: Nice Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are a nice addition to barware. None arrived broken, but there are 3 of the 6 where there are clearly some manufacturing defects in the molding process. I'm guessing this is why they are inexpensive. Nevertheless, I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E Haupt

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses.
customer_reviews.text: These are probably my favorite glasses at the moment. I didn't realize what kind of glasses these were until I went searching for some other kind, and these caught my eye, and I remembered having seen them before. I love the style and I've had no issues with these so far. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Gabrio

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. As glasses go, these are trim, chic, and oh so wonderful. They look modern and great at the table, slim all the way to the top. Arrived well packaged and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Becky T.

customer_reviews.title: These are an amazing value. Exactly the right size for a Collins ...
customer_reviews.text: These are an amazing value. Exactly the right size for a Collins glass, just the right amount of heft, clean minimal aesthetic. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: good quality and price
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted me to get a replacement for our POM tall glass that recently broke, but those are no longer available and exorbitant on Ebay. These are basically the same, without the logo.
customer_reviews.author: Ora Moose

customer_reviews.title: Decent set of collins glasses
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are very pretty for serving mixed drinks in. They seem light they are decent quality and had no blemishes out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: They look nice, but one was already broken when we received the package. There was no damage to the shipping box, so I imagine this are just very delicate glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Neeser

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful ‘long-drink’ glasses!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are perfect! We use them for Bloody-Mary’s when we have a Brunch, and for ice-tea when the weather gets warmer. They are attractive, and really the perfect size for any long-drink! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: atticuz

customer_reviews.title: Very functional glasses for any occasion
customer_reviews.text: I got these to use as everyday glasses. I am very satisfied with these. they are a good size, easy to hold (not too heave or light) and so far they are all in good shape. They are also attractive and can be put to more formal use if you want.
customer_reviews.author: FAB

customer_reviews.title: Good price for great cocktail glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase. Exactly the right size highball cocktail glasses, and at a good price. Arrived in good condition, no flaws. Holds up well in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Josh N

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these glasses! Slim & sleek design, feel sturdy, super clear; already went through several cycles in the dishwasher without any problems. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Tall Cocktail Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some tall slim cocktail glasses like you’d find at a great bar.., they’re stylish and I’ve had fun making great drinks that looks professionally made. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Quality and beauty
customer_reviews.text: These will last a long long time. Italian glass. Very lovely clear glass in a size you will use everyday. Not too thing and perfectly weighted bottoms. Get them!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Check to make sure they are all highballs
customer_reviews.text: Check to make sure all the glasses are what you ordered. Within my box of 6 was one ridged glass that did not belong. The highball glasses though are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: They all look small around but aren’t
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two types paksh and another one perfect size other just a little bigger I’ve bought 4 sets to get the one size and finally got right size again yesterday
customer_reviews.author: jackie stumpf

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great size highball glasses!
customer_reviews.text: These Italian Highball glasses are absolutely perfect for my petite hands. I often have trouble holding glasses that are larger. These are elegant and sturdy, and their capacity is just right.
customer_reviews.author: D. Irene S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for mojitos!
customer_reviews.text: Just a hair too narrow for the ice cubes I'm using, but that's a problem of the cube tray, not the glasses. Double check that your cubes will fit in this glass before ordering, and you should be golden! (Tip: If the cubes are too large to fit normally, try turning them on their side.)
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: These are nice quality and were well packaged
customer_reviews.text: These are nice quality and were well packaged, so no damage on arrival. They are a good weight and great for an everyday hi-ball glass. They were wider than I was expecting, its difficult to gauge without seeing them, but still very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: amgp2

customer_reviews.title: Glasses should be packed better!
customer_reviews.text: The glasses came broken. As soon as I lifted the box I could hear all the broken glass. I was very disappointed especially because I was planning on using them the following evening for a dinner party
customer_reviews.author: cindy mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Cracked glass
customer_reviews.text: One of the glasses has a small crack in it. Cant return because I need to use these tonight
customer_reviews.author: Jermark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cocktail and mocktail glasses
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product! Can't over ice the drinks, great for lemonade too.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle John 1964

customer_reviews.title: Very nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were purchased for making Bloody Mary drinks but have become a favorite for everyday drinks. Very sturdy and good feel.
customer_reviews.author: 2BTrim1

customer_reviews.title: High quality glasswear - recommend
customer_reviews.text: Can you get similar looking glasses for less than half at IKEA? Sure, but these mammajammas are slick. You mix a 7&7 in one of these badboys, you make, as the kids say, Sinatra look like a hobo. Professional bar level stuff at a price I can afford. Don't be the guy who spends thousands on a home bar, stocks top shelf hooch and then pours it into junk.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J. Strobel

customer_reviews.title: I really like these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I really like these glasses. I wasn't able to find anything similar locally for a better price, so I was pleased when these arrived quickly and were as expected. Good size, nice weight, and they arrived nicely packaged and unbroken. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect glassware!
customer_reviews.text: I love this glassware! I live in a condo so I like that these glasses are thin (width) because I have limited cabinet space, but they also look great and feel durable. I bought an extra set because I like them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Shanks

customer_reviews.title: Have the height and diameter looking for but one glass is flawed...
customer_reviews.text: I just opened my glasses and love the shape...would have liked a heavier bottom which is just a classy look and feel...but most disappointing is that one glass has a lateral imperfection, like a crack within the glass itself although smooth to the touch. I will update when I use these for the cocktail hour of a dinner party this weekend but expect this flaw will cause the glass to break easily at the slightest provocation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are great hi ball glasses. Sturdy, easy to hold. Simple classic lines. Timeless. Works for all kinds of drinks and coctails!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I honestly thought these glasses weren’t going to be that great but once I received them and saw them, they exceeded my expectations! The glass isn’t thin and cheap like. It’s thick and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty , yet not incredibly durable
customer_reviews.text: Many of them broke after a a few months of use . Some broke just in the dishwasher on the top rack. They are light but that also kind of tells the durability. They are nice looking though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: Used this highball glass for a cocktail drink and the feel of the glass was high quality from top to bottom. If you are looking for a highball glass with good quality, this is a good choice for the money.
customer_reviews.author: thai son

customer_reviews.title: You can feel the quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised. The glass is restaurant quality;heavy, smooth, easy to handle. A representative from the company sent an email to make sure the product met my standards and to inform me of the 5 year warranty- wow! Great service, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Trace Pilar

customer_reviews.title: Really nice for evening drinks
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son - he really likes the shape and size. Perfect for an afternoon or evening refresher drink.
customer_reviews.author: grace

customer_reviews.title: DUAL PURPOSE GLASSES...READ REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: Now that ARTHRITIS has attacked my hands, these glasses are the perfect size to get my hands around; no more dropping glasses. In addition, to start the day w/o pain, I fill two glasses with ice and hold on for 15 mins. Them I'm ready to exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Rall

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, Slender Tall Glasses
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for a tall, slender glass that would hold more volume than the wide glasses typically found on store shelves and be easier for someone with small hands to hold. These glasses are a perfect solution! They are very attractive, hold about 9 to 10 ounces, and are easy to grasp.
customer_reviews.author: 78degreegirl

customer_reviews.title: Thicker Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Great high ball glasses. Thick. Unlikely to break by something else touching it in the sink or dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for serving Italian Amaro Spritz cocktails. Haven't used them enough to assess durability, but they seem to be designed well.
customer_reviews.author: DMR

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer...Jealous Visitors
customer_reviews.text: Looking forward to buying more for myself and probably a Christmas gift for others. Product arrived in tact and still looks great after about a dozen trips through the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Tom Collins anyone?
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this glass. I bought to use for Tom Collins and Bloody Mary drinks. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: C. Duhon

customer_reviews.title: Classy!
customer_reviews.text: I love them, very classy and simple. However they can be hard to clean. They tip over and break in the dishwasher if you aren't careful and they are too tall and narrow to wash by hand easily.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and weight
customer_reviews.text: Used glasses this size several years ago while staying at cottage on the Eastern Shore of Virginia. Happened to see these on Amazon while looking for something else. Ordered them to see if they were the same as what I was looking for. Happy to find out they were the perfect size, smaller than a regular water glass but similar shape. Perfect for summer mixed drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Quinton User

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I love the glasses, I really wanted a sixteen oz, but this works for now. They arrived and each one was intact, not even a chip. Thank you. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Raisin Hale

customer_reviews.title: It’s cool.
customer_reviews.text: Like the product, thought it’d be heavier as stated in the description. I was looking for a REAL heavy set to entertain with and enjoy ice cold drinks. It’s cool. Search still continues (for me). But if you want nice glasses, this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. I have arthritis in my hands and they are small enough for me to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Howard

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, got these just before Christmas and 3 of them have already broken!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive. Tall & Thin
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are very attractive. It's a high class look. A good water glass for a dinner party too. They are thin and tall
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect glasses.  Excellent weight and height.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses came in just today. Plan to run them through the dishwasher and "Pour a Tall Cool One". Just to try them out. I like the way they feel in a persons hand and the length.is exactly what I wanted. You sell a good product. Thank you for a good product. Really like the weight and feel of the glasses. Sam
customer_reviews.author: Samuel R. Tyler

customer_reviews.title: You need these!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses! The shape can be casual or elegant. Beverages look wonderful, you can see the garnishes in them and the base weight is perfect. They do not take up much area in the cabinet and I would not hesitate to buy more of them as a gift or for me! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these!!! They are the perfect size and they are dishwasher safe!!! I love them
customer_reviews.author: jeneric

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Arrived without anything broken. Glasses are great and feel like good quality.
customer_reviews.author: @m@zon customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have never bought glasses from amz before so was wary but these glasses are great! Very sturdy, very good looking. Love them! Will be getting more!
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Clean lool!
customer_reviews.text: Like the glasses very much. They’re simple and yet elegant at the same time. Will buy some more!
customer_reviews.author: RJP

customer_reviews.title: Versatile going with any dish set
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are elegant in their simplicity. They hold a lot but are easy to grasp because they are tall but skinny.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Reputable seller, promptly delivers what they advertise
customer_reviews.text: I am using these as part of wood turned vase to hold fresh flowers, the size of the glasses had to exact and constant for all the vases . They fit all to the dimensions that were quoted, strong and durable. good looking and functional. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: drbob

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE. CHEAPLY MADE.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses broke, one by one, over the course of 3 months. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and solid! Perfect cylinder shape, fits in my glasses hutch so well! They also match in style, libbey heavy base 5.5 oz glasses, just a little bigger around!
customer_reviews.author: gia

customer_reviews.title: Best Mojitos Glasses.
customer_reviews.text: These highball glasses are soo attractive and comfortable in serving my Mojitos. My family love it. Recomend to all.
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a good purchase. I would recommend these glasses
customer_reviews.author: keith barnes

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love a good high ball glass prefect for cocktails
customer_reviews.author: linsel

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with quality control on these 3 of the 6 glass tops hade huge imperfections. The ones that do not have Imperfections are very nice
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant in a simplistic way.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice glassware. I would order more if they had a larger size. I highly recommend these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend it to friend
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Can be used for many types of drinks
customer_reviews.author: Longer Gu

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and as advertised
customer_reviews.text: They are sturdy and durable. I have moderately dropped one of the glasses already and it didn’t make a scratch. They are pleasant looking and are not too big. They are my new favorite glasses to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I feel like im at the Ritz sipping a "high Ball"
customer_reviews.text: Great glass for the price, heavy and elegant, serves the purpose at the end of a long day.
customer_reviews.author: mark Allen kaeppel

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. Well packaged for shipment. Just the size I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Deb58

customer_reviews.title: Would have been 5 Star, if it weren’t for the crack.
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Unfortunately, one of the glasses has a crack on the inside of the glass. Still usable at this point, and again, we are enjoying the glasses regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina's mom

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect glasses
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about the sturdiness or durability of glasses, but they seem to be made well
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: They are solid, not the thin stuff other places sell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to thoroughly inspect your glasses before using them.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice glasses overall. I received a defective one that had an extremely sharp piece along the rim. I cut my hand thinking it was from opening the box, then later realized it was from the glass when I was washing it. It cut me twice in the same night.
customer_reviews.author: She’s Savvy

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Came timely, great quality. Ordered 2nd set after seeing the 1st was so nice.
customer_reviews.author: John Plowman

customer_reviews.title: satisfied and packaging is great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of the glass. And theyre perfect! Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Heart Arries-Beau

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gin and tonic glass
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for an appropriate glass for tall, summer drinks -- gin & tonics, dark & stormies -- and I found it in this product. The glass is sturdy enough for the dishwasher but slender enough for my small hands. I bought six but will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk69

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Overall I enjoy these glasses. I purchased them to make mojitos, and although I typically don't use all 6 at once (they're too small to use for serving waters) they fit perfectly in my cabinet. Durable, attractive, and great value. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Let me join in with the others who have said these glasses have a nice weight to them. The price is excellent for the value- package of 6 for $16.99 !?! These are not paper thin at the top like so many I've tried in the past. It is one thickness, not fluted, all the way up. If I had to say one nit-picky thing, they're a bit smaller than what I had. My fault for not checking. But- again, I'm very pleased with this set of glasswear. (P/S- wash up nicely on top rack of dishwasher.)
customer_reviews.author: M/E Aaron 1 of 2

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Looking for quality hi ball glasses with heavy bottoms.....FOUND IT! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri C.

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses for Cocktails
customer_reviews.text: Great for making some of my favorite cocktails. Highballs, Gin and Tonic, etc
customer_reviews.author: Adam S. Ertel

customer_reviews.title: Not for long noses
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are too narrow to drink from, especially for people with long noses.
customer_reviews.author: Rosina

product_meta.title: Paksh Novelty Italian Highball Glasses [Set of 6] Clear Heavy Base Tall Bar Glass - Drinking Glasses for Water, Juice, Beer, Wine, Whiskey, and Cocktails | 13 Ounce Cups
feature_bullets: This exquisite 6 piece, 13 ounce glassware set features luxurious and luminous Italian crafted glass that’s sure to turn heads. These fine European glass tumblers preserve beverages’ crisp, rich texture for a fresh taste every time.

Modern yet timeless, these highball glasses dawn a contemporary look that is perfect for entertaining and everyday use. With its sleek silhouette and clean design, this tumbler glass set is versatile enough for casual and formal use.

The drink glasses thin, cylindrical shape is easy to grasp, and their lightweight construction with thick base keeps glass from shattering while still being comfortable to hold for extended periods of time.

Feel safe serving beverages to loved ones in this guaranteed lead-free drinkware set. No worries about harmful chemicals and substances leaching into your drinks here! Look no further for the perfect Christmas, birthday, anniversary, or any special occasion gift.
This highball glasses set of 6 is extremely easy to clean! Just wash each cooler glass by hand with soap and warm water! The glasses are 6 1/2" tall and 2-1/2" Diameter.
